DOC.brief_summary: To date , lack consensus concern optimal timing removal urethral catheter , related complication , effectiveness prophylactic drug use reduce complication , patient report outcome ( quality life ) robot-assisted laparoscopic prostatectomy ( RALP ) . The purpose study determine impact tamsulosin void pattern follow early urethral catheter removal RALP prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Tamsulosin Voiding Patterns Following Early Catheter Removal After Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: Patients must localize locally advanced prostate cancer Patients must receive robot assist laparoscopic radical prostatectomy Patients must able provide write informed consent Patients must history treatment alpha blocker within 4 week Patients must previously undergo transurethral resection , laser therapy , surgery prostate Patients must previously diagnose neurogenic bladder Patients must hypersensitivity trial drug alphablockers Patients must participation clinical trial within past 3 month
